Scripts.OnShow: this.UpdateYourself = true;
Scripts.OnEnter: QH_DisplayTooltip("移除该玩家", this);

Scripts.OnShow: PanelTemplates_TabResize(0);
QuickHealHealingBar:Show();
this:SetValue(QuickHealVariables["RatioFull"]*100);
this:SetValue(QuickHeal_GetRatioHealthy()*100);

Scripts.OnValueChanged: QuickHealVariables.Waste = this:GetValue(); QuickHealConfig_TextWaste:SetText("过量打断阈值: " .. this:GetValue() .. "%");
Scripts.OnShow: this:SetValue(QuickHealVariables.Waste);
this:SetValue(QuickHealVariables["RatioForceself"]*100);
this:SetValue(QuickHealVariables["PetPriority"]);

Scripts.onClick: if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables.QuickClickEnabled = true; if type(QuickClick_Load) == "function" then QuickClick_Load() end else QuickHealVariables.QuickClickEnabled = false; if type(QuickClick_Unload) == "function" then QuickClick_Unload() end end

Scripts.OnShow: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this,QuickHeal_ComboBoxNotificationStyle_Fill); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(this,QuickHealVariables["NotificationStyle"]);
UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this,QuickHeal_ComboBoxMessageConfigure_Fill); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(this,"Healing");

Scripts.onClick: local Config = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(QuickHealConfig_ComboBoxMessageConfigure) if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["MessageScreenCenter" .. Config] = true; else QuickHealVariables["MessageScreenCenter" .. Config] = false; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText(Config .. " 消息" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "传送到屏幕中心.") end

local Config = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(QuickHealConfig_ComboBoxMessageConfigure) if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["MessageChatWindow" .. Config] = true; else QuickHealVariables["MessageChatWindow" .. Config] = false; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText(Config .. " 消息" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "传送到聊天窗口.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["OverhealMessageScreenCenter"] = true; else QuickHealVariables["OverhealMessageScreenCenter"] = false; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("过量治疗状态" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "显示在屏幕中央.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["OverhealMessageCastingBar"] = true; else QuickHealVariables["OverhealMessageCastingBar"] = false; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("过量治疗状态" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "显示在治疗条上.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables.OverhealMessagePlaySound = true; else QuickHealVariables.OverhealMessagePlaySound = false; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("声音警报" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "在严重过量情况下播放.") end

FontString.name: QuickHealConfig_TextFilterRaidGroup
FontString.text: 选择你要治疗的团队队伍:

FontString.name: QuickHealConfig_TextFilterNote
FontString.text: 备注: 这个选项是命令 '/qh subgroup' 或 '治疗团队' 的绑定键.

Scripts.onClick: if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup1"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup1"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍1将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup2"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup2"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍2将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup3"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup3"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍3将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup4"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup4"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍4将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup5"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup5"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍5将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup6"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup6"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍6将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup7"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup7"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍7将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

if this:GetChecked() then QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup8"] = false; else QuickHealVariables["FilterRaidGroup8"] = true; end if( this.tooltipShown ) then GameTooltip:SetText("队伍8将" .. (this:GetChecked() and " " or " 不 ") .. "被治疗.") end

Scripts.OnEnter: QH_DisplayTooltip(QH_STR_MTLIST, this);
Scripts.OnShow: this.UpdateYourself = true;

Scripts.OnEnter: QH_DisplayTooltip(QH_STR_MELEEDPSLIST, this);
Scripts.OnShow: this.UpdateYourself = true;
